body_html:
One also needs to update Eigen that supports cuda 9 for the original problem mentioned in this issue.
Try this in workspace.bzl file-
"http://bazel-mirror.storage.googleapis.com/bitbucket.org/ncluehr/eigen/get/6cc72014d888.tar.gz", "https://bitbucket.org/ncluehr/eigen/get/6cc72014d888.tar.gz", ], sha256 = "549fc01af565d185123016c12baf997eeb462b088c1885a4c3dfaf2a5c82d677", strip_prefix = "ncluehr-eigen-6cc72014d888",
body_text:
One also needs to update Eigen that supports cuda 9 for the original problem mentioned in this issue.
Try this in workspace.bzl file-
    "http://bazel-mirror.storage.googleapis.com/bitbucket.org/ncluehr/eigen/get/6cc72014d888.tar.gz", "https://bitbucket.org/ncluehr/eigen/get/6cc72014d888.tar.gz",           ], sha256 = "549fc01af565d185123016c12baf997eeb462b088c1885a4c3dfaf2a5c82d677", strip_prefix = "ncluehr-eigen-6cc72014d888",
body:
One also needs to update Eigen that supports cuda 9 for the original problem mentioned in this issue.
Try this in workspace.bzl file-
`   
          "http://bazel-mirror.storage.googleapis.com/bitbucket.org/ncluehr/eigen/get/6cc72014d888.tar.gz",
          "https://bitbucket.org/ncluehr/eigen/get/6cc72014d888.tar.gz",
